resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.degree: Master of Natural and Applied Science

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Utilized C# and SQL to develop WPF applications to efficiently extract and convert hundreds of terabytes of legacy financial data from numerous different core banking systems. Worked with research and development team on design and implementation of in-house conversion applications. Refactored existing applications to increase speed and produce more accurate output. Drove coordination between team members and management by organizing meetings to provide project updates

projects.title: Combine
projects.category: Engaging word game that challenges users to find as many words as they can!

projects.title: Superhost
projects.category: Photo display for ecommerce travel site

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
